transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, good afternoon sir. Hello.
Customer: Hello bolo madam.
Executive: Ji good afternoon sir. Anshika baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Hanji sir.
Executive: Kya issue, hanji kya issue hai matlab uske regarding aapko jo physical executive chahiye tha.
Customer: Bolo madam.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hanji.
Executive: Main aapke unse baat hui thi jo jisme aapne kaha tha ki aapko executive diya jayega jo aapko aapke paas aakar aapko services dikhayega.
Customer: Ho gayi ho gayi baat aage ladka aaya tha wo ek baar.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Aage aap hanji aapne seekh liya aapko aage samajh.
Customer: Wo kisi liye aaya mere paas. Kuch bola nahi mere ko bola call karna main aa jaunga aisa bola hai. Main kaha seekh liya hai abhi kya thoda time hi nahi mil raha hai thoda iska use hi kam kar pa raha hu.
Executive: Achcha matlab aapki problem to solve ho gayi na aa rahe hai na wo.
Customer: Awaaz mere ko cut ho raha hai.
Executive: Ek second wait.
Customer: Awaaz hi clear nahi aa raha hai mere ko kuch jyada.
Executive: Ha ek
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needed a physical executive.

- Customer says executive did not explain anything.

- Customer says he is not getting time to use it.



Resolution:

- Executive asked if the issue was resolved.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- physical executive, services, follow up
